attributes.action: We voted to leave the single market when we voted to leave the EU
attributes.background: We all knew when we voted we would leave the single market when we voted to leave the EU , so we must leave the EU and the single market

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the UK to leave the single market, you may wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163162

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/162901

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/149124
